allow: Bash(# Create new directory structure mkdir -p v_1/src/preprocessing mkdir -p v_1/src/training/baseline mkdir -p v_1/src/training/mmbert mkdir -p v_1/src/analysis mkdir -p v_1/models/baseline mkdir -p v_1/models/mmbert # Move existing scripts folder contents to preprocessing if [ -d ""v_1/scripts"" ]; then mv v_1/scripts/* v_1/src/preprocessing/ || true rmdir v_1/scripts || true fi # Move new src files to training/baseline mv v_1/src/data_utils.py v_1/src/training/baseline/ || true mv v_1/src/model.py v_1/src/training/baseline/ || true mv v_1/src/01_prepare_data.py v_1/src/training/baseline/ || true mv v_1/src/02_train.py v_1/src/training/baseline/ || true echo ""New structure:"" find v_1/src -type f -name ""*.py"")
